duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop new opportunities within specific geographical territory to meet and exceed quarterly sales quota.
Enthusiastically sell Tenable’s best-of-breed solutions to key decision makers in the territory.
Strategically plan for success by researching target prospects, potential customer’s needs, and channel partner engagement.
Over-achieve quota goals by leveraging Tenable’s strategic sales methodology.
Create joint plans with channel partners, identify territory white-space, and develop qualified sales pipelines.
Partner with SEs to deliver on both business and technical value.
Oversee professional growth opportunities in field sales, management, and operations.
